title: Drawing, "Desk: Seating at Center, Two-Stack Drawers at Right, Metal Support", 1930s
markings: Stamped in red ink in lower right hand corner, DONALD DESKEY/ 145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed:
Inscribed dimensions in graphite throughout. Inscribed in graphite at lower right, 
[Deskey #] 7095. Inscribed in red colored pencil at lower right, P.
description: Writing surface is composed of metal, leather and wood, which curves into vertical section at right, ending at floor. Two-drawer stack (round knobs) is recessed; set several inches below desk top; and attached to wood section. Metal support structure at left is comprised of vertical post attached to horizontal curved piece on floor.
